metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3839 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Bluetooth in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (loss of Bluetooth 911 functionality) via a crafted applicationthat sends a signal to a Bluetooth process, aka internal bug 28885210.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
